cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 225 miles east of Caibarién, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: expected to turn northwest, move along Cuba’s north coast, then cross the Florida Keys and track northward up the Florida peninsula toward Georgia/South Carolina

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from north of Jupiter Inlet FL to Flagler/Volusia County Line and north of Bonita Beach FL to Anclote River; Cuban provinces Guantanamo eastward
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Jupiter Inlet southward around Florida peninsula to Bonita Beach including Florida Keys and Lake Okeechobee; Storm-Surge Warning Sebastian Inlet southward around Florida peninsula to Venice
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Cuba, Bahamas, Florida Keys, entire Florida peninsula, coastal Georgia and South Carolina
weather_observation.wind: At most brief tropical-storm-force gusts possible if track shifts west; current probability very low (≤3%)
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Mississippi coast based on current track
weather_observation.rainfall: Showers possible; heavy rainfall not expected
